company_overview.description: STEMROBO Technologies is the leading Edtech company in India that specializes in providing comprehensive end-to-end solutions for K-12 schools, aligning with the National Education Policy (NEP) 2020. It's an Educational Technology Company focused on leveraging Technology in Education, which acts as an enabler for students to learn and innovate in the field of STEAM, Robotics, IoT & Artificial Intelligence (AI).
company_overview.mission: To equip students and teachers with 21st-century skills (STEM, Coding, Robotics, AI, ML, IoT, AR & VR) necessary to thrive in the rapidly changing innovation landscape.
